name: Ultra Addons Lite for Elementor
author: UltraPress

sections.description:
Ultra Addons Lite for Elementor provides Elementor addons to enhance your page-building experience. Elevate your Elementor pages with creative elements and extensions, adding power to your page builder. Our easy-to-use elements are designed to simplify your next WordPress website build. Each element comes with a plethora of options, allowing you to control every aspect of your design. With your imagination, you can achieve nearly any design.

28+ Free Elements and Counting

  • Site Logo

    The Site Logo widget gives you the ability to change the design aspects of the logo.

  • Nav Menu

    The Nav Menu widget lets you use menus that you’ve created in WordPress and design them in whatever way you want.

  • Search

    It allows your visitors to find the needed information easily with the Search widget added to the header or footer of your website.

  • Post Grid

    The Post Grid widget lets you display posts in a grid format on any Elementor page.

  • Post List

    The Post List widget allows you to list posts with the powerful post query builder in your Elementor pages.

  • Post Block

    The Post Block widget helps you to display your blog posts to catch the eye of your site visitors & get high traffic on your blog postings.

  • Slider

    Slider widgets allow you to show blog categories and custom content in the form of a slider with a customization style option and custom slider setting.

  • Testimonial

    Showcase your Client reviews in a beautiful and trustworthy manner with a Testimonial widget

  • Content Ticker

    Display trending news, popular posts, and new events on your site with the Content Ticker widget.

  • Team

    Let people know how wonderful your team is with an advanced, creative, and highly customizable Team widget for Elementor.

  • Flip Box

    A Flip Box widget allows you to flip your content when you hover over it also use animated Flip Boxes to highlight any content.

  • Progress Bar

    Visualize your project’s progress with our Progress Bar widget. Using it, you can showcase skills, success rates, future goal predictions, or project progress with lots of styles and control options.

  • Carousel

    Carousel widgets allow you to add multiple images to the items and display them in the form of a slider with multiple items and a custom slider setting.

  • Fun Fact

    Using the Fun Fact widget, you can showcase the number, statistics, achievements, and facts in a progressive number counter. This animated number counter helps to customize the background, icon, and format to display your number counter accordingly.

  • Image Comparison

    Display your Elementor image widget that compares two images and gives an attractive before and after slider effect. With Image Comparison widget, you can compare the image by selecting vertical or horizontal with motion effects, customize label color, typography, background type, margin, padding, etc for before and after images.

  • Icon Box

    The Icon Box widget allows you to display a short brief about the services you provide or products you offer with customization style and slider options.

  • Table Press

    The Table Press widget is the most powerful add-on to design your table with Elementor.

  • Video Popup

    The Video Popup widget gives you the ability to add playable videos and self-hosted videos to your page with different styles and many more features.

  • Pricing Table

    Describe your clear product value with the Pricing Table widget. It helps to customize the header, price tag, features, button, pricing figure, and much more.

  • Calendly

    Calendly is one of the market’s best booking and appointment tools. Schedule meetings without the back-and-forth emails through Calendly.

  • Scroll To Top

    Enhance your site visitor’s experience by letting them navigate to the top of your page instantly. Scroll To Top widgets lets you add a simple and fully customizable button to help users scroll to the top of your webpage in just a click when they are done reading your whole content.

  • Marquee Text

    The Marquee Text widget allows you to easily display sections with customizable auto-scroll text.

  • Text Rotator

    Text Rotator allows you to take any text and rotate it in a circle that catches the eye of your site visitors.

  • Woo Products

    Woo Products widget allows you to showcase your WooCommerce Products and Categories on any page with customization style options to enhance the layout design.

  • Alert Message

    The Alert Message widget is the most effective way to grab the user’s focus over any other content.

  • Modal Popup

    The Modal Popup widget showcases your videos, images, iframe, shortcode, and any other content in a popup.

  • Type Out (New)

    Grab your visitors’ attention by featuring smoothly animated type out text sections on your pages

  • Post Tab (New)

    Display your most important and valuable blog posts in sequence and category-wise using the post tab widget for the Elementor website.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ut-elementor-addons-lite folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enjoy !!!

Available Languages

  • English

Features

  • Adds custom-made Elementor widgets to Elementor page builder.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

This plugin adds custom-made Elementor widgets which help to customize with Elementor builder with ease.

Can I use the plugin without the page builder plugin?

No. You cannot use without Elementor since it’s an addon for Elementor.

Editor fails to load or not working?

It’s due to your server’s PHP settings. Increase your server PHP memory limit from the wp-config.php file or php.ini file. If you don’t have an idea about it. Please contact your hosting provider and ask to increase these parameters
* PHP memory_limit = 512M
* max_execution_time = 300

Does it work with any theme?

YES! It will work with any theme where Elementor works.

Will your plugin affect the performance of my site?

We run tests to ensure the speed of the site is not affected when you activate our Elementor add-ons.

What if I update to the Premium version?

Your existing Elementor elements & content will work with the premium version. So you won’t lose your developed contents or any Elementor elements.

What are the recommended PHP settings

Minimum PHP version 5.6
memory_limit 256M or more
post_max_size 64M
sections.changelog:
1.1.7

  • Optimize and refine the plugin comprehensively
  • Compatibility checked with latest version of WordPress, WooCommerce and Elementor plugin

1.1.6

  • Updated icon and banner of the plugin
  • Updated FAQ of the plugin.

1.1.5

  • Added Type Out element
  • Added Post Tab element

1.1.4

  • Fixed issues in WOO product element
  • Fixed issues in the icon box element
  • Fixed issues in the image comparison element
  • Fixed issues in the nav menu element
  • Added dynamic shortcode for Elementor template

1.1.3

  • Fixed mobile responsive issues in the nav menu element
  • Fixed responsive menu backend option issues in the nav menu element
  • Fixed js in the nav menu element
  • Refine all element

1.1.2

  • Added Alert Message element
  • Added Modal Popup element
  • Fixed design option and responsive issues
  • Refinement and fixing bugs

1.1.1

  • Added 3 new elements
  • Added column link
  • Minor bug fixes

1.1.0

  • Refinement and fixing bugs

1.0.9

  • Fixed video issue after 1.0.8 update

1.0.8

  • Enhanced code
  • Fixed menu issue
  • Fixed sanitation, escaping, and prefixing

1.0.7

  • Added elements( Fun Fact, Icon Box, Video, Image Comparison and Tablepress )

1.0.6

  • Fixed design option issues of the Menu element
  • Enhanced search element with more options
  • Updated translation ready

1.0.5

  • Compatibility test and fixed with Elementor version 3.2.3

1.0.4

  • Added three new element for Elementor( Flip box, Progress bar and Carousel )
  • Improved existing elements
  • Compatibility tested with the latest Elementor version

1.0.3

  • Added Testimonials element
  • Added Team element
  • Added Content Ticker element
  • Enhancement to existing elements performance

1.0.2

  • Added theme meta options

1.0.1

  • Minor Bug Fixes

1.0.0

  • Uploaded to wordpress.org
